about_the_game:
In the game, you can obtain cat eggs by cleaning up poop and fur balls, or by destroying furniture, which allows you to hatch different breeds of cats. Feed them and wait for them to grow, as they will bring you little surprises.

You can freely arrange the flooring in the space and fill every corner with furniture. Combine different flooring and wall textures to create a unique atmosphere. Build a one-of-a-kind comfortable living environment for your cats.

Capture capsule toy sprites to discover a variety of furniture and items, and collect them to fill your catalog. Or interact with them to see what kind of chemistry might emerge?
detailed_description:
In the game, you can obtain cat eggs by cleaning up poop and fur balls, or by destroying furniture, which allows you to hatch different breeds of cats. Feed them and wait for them to grow, as they will bring you little surprises.

You can freely arrange the flooring in the space and fill every corner with furniture. Combine different flooring and wall textures to create a unique atmosphere. Build a one-of-a-kind comfortable living environment for your cats.

Capture capsule toy sprites to discover a variety of furniture and items, and collect them to fill your catalog. Or interact with them to see what kind of chemistry might emerge?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: macOS 15.1+
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: CatCat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7970
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "CatCat" is a relaxing cat simulation game. Raise different breeds, feed them, and pet them. You can freely change the layout, arrange furniture, and alter wall colors to create a cozy space for you and your cats. There are no goals or pressure; just enjoy a peaceful time together with your cats.
